name: q32_meaning_field_spec
notes: This spec is for the Q32 falsification harness. It is NOT a claim that meaning is a new fundamental QFT gauge field.
R is treated as a field on a semiosphere (state/meaning manifold).

grad_S.rationale: grad_S must be a scale/uncertainty normalizer; using SE is appropriate when mu_hat is a mean-estimator.

check_set.definition: Independent empirical check observations (truth-anchored in synthetic; externally anchored in public datasets).

selection_policy.name: fixed_per_benchmark
selection_policy.rule: Choose a kernel family per benchmark/domain before running experiments. Do not switch kernels mid-run based on outcomes.

falsifiers: Echo-chamber falsifier: correlated consensus must not sustain high M under independence stress (adding independent check data).
Negative controls: permutation/shuffle of checks must destroy discrimination.
Ablations: ungrounded resonance (internal agreement only) must exhibit the known echo-chamber vulnerability (echo looks 'high resonance').
